page.title: 13The Pit and the Community
page.content: The area has grown up around the pit.{Frickley hospital}was opened by the pit as a surgical unit in 1905.It was used for treating mining accidents and was maintained by a miners' levy.It was a cottage hospital at first.It is called{Warde Aldam after the local landowner who owned most of the land in the area.It is now run by the Health Authority and is in the process of becoming a{psychiatric unit for a wider area,much to the dismay of many local people.Once a year a garden party is held in the local grounds.There also used to be a maternity hospital nearby but this is now the{Frickley Colliery Officials {and Staff Social Club.}This is nicknamed{"The Nudge and Whisper".}If you were talking about an official you would get a nudge and a whisper.
